\(Y = b_{1}\)\(Y = b_{2}\)...\(Y = b_{m}\)\(\sum\)
\(X = a_{1}\)\(h_{1,1}\)\(h_{1,2}\)...\(h_{1,m}\)\(h_{1,*}\)
\(X = a_{2}\)\(h_{2,1}\)\(h_{2,2}\)...\(h_{2,m}\)\(h_{2,*}\)
..................
\(X = a_{l}\)\(h_{l,1}\)\(h_{l,2}\)...\(h_{l,m}\)\(h_{l,*}\)
\(\sum\)\(h_{*,1}\)\(h_{*,2}\)...\(h_{*,m}\)\(n\)
<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[55, 188, 650, 214]]<|/det|> wir bestimmen \(\bar{x}\) und \(\bar{y}\) und sortieren wirte Daten: <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[0, 0, 999, 999]]<|/det|>
\(x_{i} - \bar{x} < 0\)klein\(y_{i} - \bar{y} < 0\)klein
\(x_{i} - \bar{x} > 0\)gross\(y_{i} - \bar{y} > 0\)gross
→ in Punktwolke eupben sich folgende Vorzeichen:
+ für + +oder - -
- für + -oder - - +
↔ wir betrachten \((x_{i} - \bar{x})(y_{i} - \bar{y})\)
\(x_{i} - \bar{x} < 0\), \(y_{i} - \bar{y} > 0\)\(x_{i} - \bar{x} > 0\), \(y_{i} - \bar{y} < 0\)-+
\(x_{i} - \bar{x} < 0\) \(y_{i} - \bar{y} < 0\)\(x_{i} - \bar{x} > 0\) \(y_{i} - \bar{y} > 0\)+-
Empirische Covarianz
Cov \((x, y) = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_{i} - \bar{x})(y_{i} - \bar{y})\)
= \(\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} x_{i} y_{i} - \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} x_{i} \bar{y} - \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} y_{i} \bar{x} + \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} x_{i}\bar{y}\)
= \(\bar{x}\)= \(\bar{y}\)= \(n \cdot \bar{x} \bar{y}\)
= \(\frac{1}{n} \sum_{j=1}^{n} x_{i} y_{i} - \bar{x} \bar{y} - \bar{x} \bar{y} + \bar{x} \bar{y}\)
= \(\frac{1}{n} \sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{i} y_{i} - \bar{x} \overline{y}\)
